body:
## Release Notes

## Features

- Start keeping messages in the database @robinlinden (#24)
- Add state and the ability to set the nick and status message @JFreegman (#19)
- Set up a database and contact persistence. @robinlinden (#20)
- add drawer menu and skeleton settings/profile pages @JFreegman (#17)
- Add an add contact page @robinlinden (#16)
- Add bootstrap node behind websocket on heroku. @iphydf (#9)

## Performance improvements

- [ImgBot] Optimize images @imgbot (#1)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Bump dependencies, update what we target in CI @robinlinden (#23)
- Fix Flutter 2.10 build, target it in CI @robinlinden (#18)
- Fix heroku build for real. @iphydf (#13)
- Fix heroku build. @iphydf (#12)
- Use flutter-web image and add heroku build to CI. @iphydf (#11)
- Add BUILD file and associated tests. @iphydf (#5)
- Set the right port when launching on heroku. @iphydf (#4)
- Add web dockerfile and heroku config. @iphydf (#3)
- Add github settings for CI required checks. @iphydf (#2)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Remove websockify from this repo. @iphydf (#22)
- Split main.dart into logical chunks @robinlinden (#7)
